Hi everyone,

<br />

It's been a busy few months. We've (nearly) finished our new control panel and are deploying our new hardware across all of our global locations.

<br />

Please find our Black Friday 2021 deals below.

<br />

~15 December delivery: Amsterdam, Stockholm, Los Angeles, Chicago, New York
~30 December delivery: Hong Kong, Tokyo, Singapore, Sydney, London, Vienna, Warsaw, Zurich, Oslo, Milan, Madrid


<pre>
1 CPU core (12.5% dedicated, burstable up to 100%)
2 GB RAM
15 GB NVMe storage

$17 per year
</pre>

<br />


Storage deals - [Order here](https://cloud.hosthatch.com/sale/blackfriday2021-storage "Order here")

~15 December delivery: Amsterdam, Stockholm, Los Angeles, and Chicago):


<pre>
1 CPU core (fairly shared)
512 MB RAM
1 TB storage
3 TB bandwidth
$35 per year ($60 per two years)
double the RAM and bandwidth for two years
</pre>

</pre>

Storage plans come on E5v2 or AMD Zen1 (it is not possible to choose), with RAID-50/60 and SSD caching. These are meant to be used for mass storage, and not I/O intensive tasks.

<br />

Important notes:

- All orders are final and cannot be changed or refunded. We have limited capacity available. Please only buy if you are absolutely sure that you would like to use the server.
- An order is considered final once it is paid for. There is no 'reservation' system.
- We will cancel all unpaid orders after 60 minutes of them being unpaid. If you order something, do not pay for it, and it goes out of stock, we will not be able to offer it to you again.


We might offer some flash deals on Monday, however this isn't a promise. We have very limited capacity available this time around.


I understand that the pricing might look more expensive than the last year. This is to account for the newer hardware and much higher IP costs. This pricing also allows us to make a slightly healthier profit to offer you a better service and support in the future.

<br />

Thank you everyone! :)
